entry.title: Kyiv Seeks Release of Troops in Besieged Azovstal Steel Plant
entry.content: The Ukrainian government said it had opened talks on evacuating soldiers trapped in the Azovstal steel mill in Mariupol in stages, as the EU was preparing a proposal to boost funding for Ukraineâ€™s military.

entry.title: 'I Cannot Imagine My Life Without Parents.' A Boy's War Diary Tells of Grief in Ukraine
entry.content: A 12-year-old Ukrainian boy who lost his mother and stepfather in a Russian attack on a village near Kyiv recounts the sorrow and fear of wartime in his diary.
